name: function
description: Run javascript directly within XIBLE, including manipulating input and output values of the node.

inputs.description: Reference these input values using the 'inputs' variable in your code, which returns an array.

trigger.description: Call 'trigger()' in your code to trigger this output.

values.description: Assign one or multiple values to this output by assigning directly to the 'values' variable in your code.
